title: Jessy and Nessy
overview: Jessy & Nessy is a series about Jessy, an innately curious little girl and her best friend, Nessy, a five-and-a-half-thousand-year-old purple sea monster. Jessy happens to see the world a little differently through her magical glasses called â€˜Inspectacles.' Together this unlikely duo explore life's curiosities and reveal how all of these seemingly everyday curiosities have fantastical answers.
